thread.title: It is as good as expected
thread.title_full: It is as good as expected - Review of Citadines Place d'Italie Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 大鈞 林
title: It is as good as expected
text: It is awesome location where the Apart'hotel is attached to shopping mall with Carrefour Hypermarket and station with three metro lines (5,6 and 7). There is a kitchen in our 1-Bedroom Apartment with a microwave, hotplates, fridge and dishwasher that is great for all our dining needs just purchasing some food next to the Apart'hotel. The front desk staff are really nice,kindness and very helpful.But the elevator is too small and there seems to be not smooth in operation
